languages.text: "Молчать". {n}Голос {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдара{/g} певуч, однако каждое сказанное им слово падает тяжело и неотвратимо, словно камень в темный омут. Повстанец послушно опускает голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Молчать". {n}Голос эльдара певуч, однако каждое сказанное им слово падает тяжело и неотвратимо, словно камень в темный омут. Повстанец послушно умолкает и опускает голову.{/n}

languages.text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Молчать". {n}Голос {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдара{/g} певуч, однако каждое сказанное им слово падает тяжело и неотвратимо, словно камень в темный омут. Повстанец послушно опускает голову.{/n}

"Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

languages.text: “安静。”{n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的声音宛如乐声，但他说出的每个字都似乎有千斤重，仿佛石头无可逆转地落入阴暗的池水中。那位叛军士兵顺从地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “安静。”{n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的声音宛如乐声，但他说出的每个字都似乎有千斤重，仿佛石头无可逆转地落入阴暗的池水中。那位叛军士兵顺从地低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: 「静粛に」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の声は旋律のようだが、それでいて発する言葉すべてが、黒い水たまりに投げ込んだ石のような取り消せない重々しさで地に落ちていく。反乱者は逆らうことなく首をすくめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「静粛に」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の声は旋律のようだが、それでいて発する言葉すべてが、黒い水たまりに投げ込んだ石のような取り消せない重々しさで地に落ちていく。反乱者は逆らうことなく首をすくめる。{/n}

languages.text: "Ruhe!" {n}Die Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} ist klangvoll, aber jedes Wort wiegt schwer und unumstößlich wie ein Stein, der in ein dunkles Becken geworfen wird. Der Rebell zieht gehorsam den Kopf ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ruhe!" {n}Die Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} ist klangvoll, aber jedes Wort wiegt schwer und unumstößlich wie ein Stein, der in ein dunkles Becken geworfen wird. Der Rebell zieht gehorsam den Kopf ein.{/n}

languages.text: « Silence. » {n}La voix de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} est musicale, mais chacun de ses mots tombe lourdement et irrévocablement, comme une pierre lâchée dans une mare sombre. Le rebelle baisse docilement la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Silence. » {n}La voix de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} est musicale, mais chacun de ses mots tombe lourdement et irrévocablement, comme une pierre lâchée dans une mare sombre. Le rebelle baisse docilement la tête.{/n}

languages.text: «Silencio». {n}La voz del {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} es melodiosa, pero sus palabras tienen el peso y la finalidad de una roca cayendo en un lago negro. El rebelde agacha la cabeza, sumiso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Silencio». {n}La voz del {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} es melodiosa, pero sus palabras tienen el peso y la finalidad de una roca cayendo en un lago negro. El rebelde agacha la cabeza, sumiso.{/n}

languages.text: "Ses çıkarma." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari'nin{/g} sesi nağmeli fakat söylediği her kelime, karanlık bir havuza düşen taş misali ağır ve dönüşü olmayan bir şekilde çıkıyor. İsyancı, itaatkâr bir biçimde başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Silence." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s voice is musical, but every word he speaks falls heavily and irrevocably like a stone dropped into a dark pool. The rebel obediently ducks his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ses çıkarma." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'nin sesi nağmeli fakat söylediği her kelime, karanlık bir havuza düşen taş misali ağır ve dönüşü olmayan bir şekilde çıkıyor. İsyancı, itaatkâr bir biçimde başını eğiyor.{/n}
